import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; Detail.propTypes = {}; function Detail(props) { const [movie, setMovie] = useState([]); const location = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { fetch(location.pathname) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setMovie(data); }); }, []); return (
Xem Phim
Ly Ngun
API

{movie.originName}

Class
Properties
Trng thi {movie.status}
S tp {movie.episodeTotal}
Thi Lng {movie.time}
Nm Pht Hnh {movie.year}
Cht Lng {movie.quality}
Ngn Ng {movie.lang}
o Din {movie.map((element)=> { return (element.name) })}
Din Vin Lee Da Hae, Lee Dong Wook, Lee Joon Gi, Park Shi Yeon, Hwang Bo Ra
Th Loi Hi Hc, Tm L
Quc Gia Hn Quc

Joo Yoo Rin l mt c gi c bit ti ni di v gii nhiu ngoi ng Anh, Hoa Nht. Seol Gong Chan l ngi k tha mt tp on khch sn ln. V cu ng ni khi cn bnh nng, Gong Chan yu cu Yoo Rin gi lm c em h lm ng ni vui. V chuyn ny khng mt ai bit. Nhng mi chuyn li b Suh Jung Woo , ngi bn thn ca Gong Chan pht hin. Nhng Jung Woo quyt nh khng ni ra s tht m gi kn cho hai ngi v Jung Woo c tnh cm vi Yoo Rin. Nhng Yoo Rin li bt u c tnh cm vi Gong Chan lm cho c Yoo Rin v Jung Woo u au kh. Nhng ng lc ny ngi bn gi c ca Gong Chan l Kim Se Hyun t nc ngoi tr v vi mong mun ni li quan h vi Gong Chan...
